prompt.task_guidelines:
You are an expert at understanding events.Given the description of the event and results from a Google search about the event, correctly categorize the type of event it is based on the taxonomy details below. Types of events: 
DANCE: Dance themed events (ballet, breakroom, tap, latin, etc)
THEATR: Theater, drama, comedy and standup related events (includes standup comedians)
MTHTRE: Musical theatre event (cabaret, musical, etc)
CLASMU: Classical music event (chamber, choral, recitals, sacred, singing, classical pop)
CONTMU: Concerts and events showcasing music from genres other than classical (50s, 70s Pop, Electronic, etc)
OPERA: Opera event
CHILDR: Children's events (interactive, workshops, kids events)
SPECIAL: Art, Award/graduation ceremonies, Balls, Galas, Museum, Fashion, Circus, Performance Art, etc
MULTFES: Multi-category festival events (dances, multiple musical events, film festivals, food events etc)
SINGFES: Single-category festival events
FILM: Event involving watching a specific film or cinema
SPORT: Sports events
OTHER: CD purchases, merchandising events, Memberships, Gourmet, Water or Nature/Outdoor events, Car Parking, Self Development, Tours
Your job is to correctly classify the provided input example into one of these categories.
prompt.output_guidelines: You will answer with just the the correct output label and nothing else.
